attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
you have put in place to many bans on us who smoke, but its our choice if we want to smoke you have taken it to far now with your bans,
THERES one ban you have not STOPPED is the sell of ciggarets in england which you won't do as you get more money for the sell of them please let us all smoke where we want in our cars if we wish or in pubs let them corner of a place for non smokers so we all have a place to go in the winter its going to be cold outside and does not look nice to see people outside the pub smoking please look into this more before you ban it as you will lose more money if everyone gives up
wake up and see what your doing

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
